title: Navigation Bar Responsiveness
description: Verify that the navigation bar is fully responsive on desktop and mobile devices, supports toggle on mobile, and enables smooth scrolling to sections.

steps.description: Open the application on a desktop browser.
Check that the navigation bar displays all menu links horizontally.
Click on a navigation link.
Verify that the page smoothly scrolls to the corresponding section.
Resize the browser window to a typical mobile screen width.
Confirm the navigation bar collapses into a toggle icon.
Click the toggle icon to open the mobile navigation menu.
Check that the menu items are displayed vertically and are accessible.
Tap on a menu item in the mobile menu.
Verify smooth scrolling to the correct section and that the menu closes.

title: Menu Category Filtering
description: Verify that menu items are correctly categorized and filtering by category updates the displayed items accurately.

steps.description: Load the menu section on the app.
Confirm that all menu categories are displayed.
Select a specific category filter.
Ensure that only items from the selected category are visible.
Clear the filter or select 'All' categories.
Verify that all menu items are displayed again.

title: Menu Item Detail Modal Display
description: Validate that clicking a menu item opens a detail modal with correct information and that the modal can be closed properly.

steps.description: Click on a menu item to open its details.
Confirm that the detail modal appears with correct item name, description, price, and image.
Check that the add-to-cart button is visible and enabled.
Close the detail modal using the close button.
Ensure the modal closes and the menu returns to its previous state.

title: Add, Update, and Remove Items in Shopping Cart
description: Test the shopping cart functionality including adding items from the menu, updating item quantities, removing items, and state persistence.

steps.description: Add one menu item to the shopping cart from the detail modal.
Verify the item appears in the cart with the correct quantity and price.
Add the same item again to increase the quantity.
Confirm that the quantity increases appropriately without duplicate entries.
Update the quantity of an item directly in the cart (e.g., increment and decrement).
Verify the item quantity updates and the total price recalculates correctly.
Remove an item from the cart.
Confirm the item is removed and the cart updates.
Reload the browser or close and reopen the app.
Check that the cart state persists with correct items and quantities via local storage.

title: Pre-Order Modal User Input Validation
description: Verify that the pre-order modal form validates user inputs for required fields and correct formats before submission.

steps.description: Open the pre-order modal from the shopping cart.
Attempt to submit the form leaving all fields empty.
Verify that validation errors are shown for all required fields.
Input invalid data formats (e.g., invalid phone number, email).
Ensure validation messages appear specifying input errors.
Fill out all required fields with valid information.
Confirm that validation errors disappear and the form can be submitted.

title: WhatsApp Message Generation and Submission
description: Ensure that upon valid pre-order form submission, a correctly formatted WhatsApp message is generated and the user is redirected or prompted appropriately.

steps.description: Complete the pre-order form with valid user details and items.
Submit the pre-order form.
Validate that the WhatsApp message content includes all order details and user information in the correct format.
Check that the user is redirected to WhatsApp web/app with the pre-filled message successfully.

title: Store Location Map Loading and Interactivity
description: Verify that the interactive store location map loads correctly, shows the correct store marker, and supports basic map interactions.

steps.description: Navigate to the Location section of the app.
Confirm the map loads without errors and the store location marker is placed correctly.
Interact with the map by zooming in and out.
Verify the map zooms smoothly and marker remains visible at correct location.
Drag or pan the map.
Check that the map pans without glitches and the marker is interactive or highlighted when clicked if applicable.

title: UI Components Consistency Across Browsers and Screen Sizes
description: Check that reusable UI components such as buttons, floating images, and social media links render consistently on major browsers and at various screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the app in latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge on desktop.
Verify that buttons, floating images, and social links appear correctly and respond to hover/focus states as designed.
Resize each browser window from mobile widths to desktop widths.
Check that UI components adapt properly with no layout breaks, remain accessible and visually consistent.

title: Shopping Cart Edge Case: Adding Large Quantity and Maximum Storage
description: Test how the shopping cart handles adding extremely large quantities of a single item and the persistence limits of local storage.

steps.description: Add a very large quantity (e.g. 9999) of a single menu item to the cart.
Verify the cart updates correctly without errors and reflects the total price accurately.
Reload the application multiple times to test persistence under large data volume.
Ensure cart data persists correctly without corruption or data loss.

title: Error Handling for WhatsApp Submission Failure
description: Verify the app's behavior when WhatsApp submission fails due to user cancellation or network issues.

steps.description: Submit a valid pre-order to generate a WhatsApp message.
Simulate user cancelling the WhatsApp message sending or simulate network failure.
Check that the app handles the cancellation or failure gracefully without crashing and offers appropriate user feedback.
